headline: PPL Corp. price target lowered to $37 from $38 at Morgan Stanley
summary: Morgan Stanley lowered the firm’s price target on PPL Corp. (PPL) to $37 from $38 and keeps an Overweight rating on the shares. The firm is updating its price targets for stocks in the Regulated & Diversified Utilities / IPPs North America sector, noting utilities underperformed the S&P in May, the analyst tells investors.
